scripts.electron:dev: concurrently "cross-env npm run dev" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && electron ."
scripts.electron:build: cross-env ELECTRON=true npm run build && node scripts/electron-build-helper.js
scripts.electron:build:mac: cross-env ELECTRON=true npm run build && cross-env PLATFORM=darwin node scripts/electron-build-helper.js
scripts.electron:build:win: cross-env ELECTRON=true npm run build && cross-env PLATFORM=win32 node scripts/electron-build-helper.js
scripts.electron:build:linux: cross-env ELECTRON=true npm run build && cross-env PLATFORM=linux node scripts/electron-build-helper.js
scripts.electron:build:linux:arm64: cross-env ELECTRON=true npm run build && cross-env PLATFORM=linux ARCH=arm64 node scripts/electron-build-helper.js
scripts.electron:build:linux:armv7l: cross-env ELECTRON=true npm run build && cross-env PLATFORM=linux ARCH=armv7l node scripts/electron-build-helper.js
scripts.electron:build:win:portable: cross-env ELECTRON=true npm run build && cross-env PLATFORM=win32 WIN_BUILD_TYPE=portable node scripts/electron-build-helper.js
scripts.electron:build:win:installer: cross-env ELECTRON=true npm run build && cross-env PLATFORM=win32 WIN_BUILD_TYPE=installer node scripts/electron-build-helper.js
